comment: For the extras how are they added?

Place all extras but the coffee in a mason jar and top with vodka enough to cover. let steep foor 1 week. dump everything into the secondary, add the cofee and rack the beer on top.  Let stand in secondary of 1 to 2 weeks.  This is a very close clone of the origional. im actually planning on brewing it again tomorrow.
Any good substitutes for the hops?
